ComicInfo.Summary: Darrow and Emerson discussion how to handle the discovery of the space station. Darrow awakens from his coma. The crew on the space station fight over whether to use the teleporter to escape before the station explodes.
ComicInfo.Tags: Emerson Strange,Dade Ellis,Thomas Walker,Simon Grimshaw,Space,World Corp.
